content: the linen square temperature blanket is constructed from 12 individual squares representing the months of the year after all of the squares are completed the ends are weaved in and the squares are wet blocked squares are seamed together with a whip stitch seam using the main color after seaming the linen stitch border is added with one round of mc then one round for each of the temperature blanket colors in order and a final round of mc the border is worked in turned rounds youtube video here https //www youtube com/watch v=zwf0kktjbd0
